Posts.EditableText: Recently I've been unable to interact with any of the commands or links on Quest's downloadable version. Whenever I click, or type a command, I get no response from the program, only usually an orange outline around what I was attempting to use. At first I thought it was the game I was on, but, I downloaded a few more and was met with the same issue.
Posts.HTML: Recently I've been unable to interact with any of the commands or links on Quest's downloadable version. Whenever I click, or type a command, I get no response from the program, only usually an orange outline around what I was attempting to use. At first I thought it was the game I was on, but, I downloaded a few more and was met with the same issue.
